doc.name: markChar

syntax.example: set the markChar of menuItem to character

doc.summary: Has no effect and is included in LiveCode for compatibility with imported HyperCard stacks.

description.p: In HyperCard, the markChar property places a character (such as a checkmark) next to a menu item.
A handler can set the markChar to any value without causing a script error, but the actual appearance of the menu item is not changed.
